snippet: A top minister’s announcement applies to the long-term unemployed in the Conservative Party’s latest effort to crack down on “welfare dependency.”
abstract: George Osborne, Britain's chancellor of the Exchequer, announces the latest in a series of moves to tighten benefits rules and crack down on dependency on welfare; says jobless Britons could be forced to do community work to keep their unemployment payments.
lead_paragraph: A top minister’s announcement applies to the long-term unemployed in the Conservative Party’s latest effort to crack down on “welfare dependency.”

headline.main: Britain Plans to Require Community Service for Long-Term Unemployment Benefits
headline.print_headline: Britain Plans to Require Community Service for Long-Term Unemployment Benefits
